summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6146 for the improvement of 50th Avenue Southwest from Sunset Avenue to approximately 140 feet south of West Walker Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85584, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
